sync.info: Every change that you make is automatically saved to your cloud.

billing.beta: While in beta, Papyrs can be used free of charge. Ultimately we will introduce a subscription model and options that will allow you to monetize your content.
billing.cycles: {0} are used to pay for running your canister smart contracts which hold your data and provide your blog posts on the web. If you ever get too few computing power, reach out on {1}.
